products.title: Fellow Clyde Electric Kettle
products.body_html:
Fellow Clyde Electric Kettle

Your daily driver is now a countertop centerpiece. With a 1.5 liter capacity, a wide mesh spout, and a stunning silicone handle, Clyde is built for all-purpose use.


Materials: 304 stainless steel kettle body, plastic base and lid surface, food-grade silicone overmolded handle with plastic end caps
Capacity: 1.5 L to the max fill line

products.title: Third Wave Water- Medium Roast
products.body_html:
Third Wave Water - Medium Roast

The Medium Roast Profile is optimal for medium roast coffees. It is recommended for traditional drip coffee brewers (Keurig, Mr. Coffee, etc.) or any manual brewing method (AeroPress, chemex, V60, etc.) providing reduced bitterness and enhanced flavors in your favorite medium roast coffees.

The Medium Roast Profile, along with the Espresso Machine Profile and Classic Light Roast Profile, fits within the Specialty Coffee Association's (SCA) guidelines for improved flavor for coffee.

products.title: Canvas Bag, Curious Cat
products.body_html:
Curious Cat Canvas Bag

Our Curious Cat tote features Nacho the kitty, a member of our pet family. Nacho, like many of us, can be curious about coffee. But don't turn your back or he'll knock over every brewer! 
Measures approximately 13"H x 18"W and is made with 15oz canvas fabric.

products.title: Bonavita 8 Cup Metropolitan Brewer
products.body_html:
Bonavita 8 Cup Thermal Carafe Flat Bottom Brewer

This stylish and modern coffee maker with a tempered glass pot brews an 8-cup carafe in about 6 minutes. Perfect for every home coffee shop, this artisan brewer has a classic and minimal design to add a stylish touch to your kitchen or office.

Bonavita One-Touch coffee brewers makes it simple to make a complex and full-bodied cup of coffee at the touch of a button. Featuring a hanging filter basket, the Metropolitan offers curated features that mimic the artisan pour-over brewing method. Created to determine how to best define coffee quality, the Golden Cup Standard measures tastes for ideal coffee flavor intensity and brew strength.

The Metropolitan’s powerful 1500-watt heater maintains an SCA-recommended brewing temperature of 198°-205°F (91°-96°C) for optimal flavor extraction and its glass carafe and heated non-stick base keep your coffee at the perfect temperature for longer. The carafe lid, filter basket, and showerhead are all dishwasher safe and the plastic is BPA-free. Our specially-designed showerhead is ideal for extraction in small batch sizes and the one-touch brew action with auto-off makes it oh-so simple to use.

• Independently tested, the Metropolitan brews coffee to Golden Cup Standard when following recommended brewing instructions

• 8-Cup One-Touch Coffee Brewer

• Performance coffee brewer makes an 8-cup carafe in approximately 6 minutes

• Powerful and precise 1500-watt heater maintains an optimal brewing temperature between 198°-205°F

• Optional pre-infusion mode mimics the artisan pour-over brewing method by pausing the water flow allowing the coffee grounds time to bloom

• Showerhead design facilitates even saturation of coffee grounds

• Audible signal when brewing cycle ends

• Flat bottom filter basket works in partnership with showerhead to provide uniform flavor extraction

• Glass carafe paired with a nonstick warming plate that shuts off after 40 minutes

• Lower wattage warming plate keeps coffee held at ideal 176˚-185˚F as recommended by the Specialty Coffee Association

• One-touch brewing for ease of use.

• Carafe, carafe lid, filter basket, and showerhead are top rack dishwasher safe and use BPA-free plastic


Product Dimensions:  Length: 12.60" Width: 6.80" Height: 12.20"

products.title: Breville, The Milk Cafe, Frother
products.body_html:
Breville, The Milk Cafe, Frother

Create rich, creamy, perfectly frothed milk for your favorite coffee drinks with this easy-to-use fully automatic frother from Breville. An induction heating system allows it to reach temperature rapidly, efficiently and consistently.

Materials: Stainless Steel.
Capacity: 25 oz. / 3 Cup
Dimensions: 6.4" x 7.5" x 10.4"

products.title: Las Palomas Coffee & Chocolate Set
products.body_html:
Las Palomas Coffee & Chocolate

What happens when single-origin cacao beans meet single-origin coffee beans? It’s a match made in heaven!

Our Valentine’s Day Las Palomas coffee + chocolate box is the perfect pairing for lovers of single-origin and quality roasted beans. This set includes a 12oz bag of Las Palomas and a Goodnow Farms Chocolate special reserve bar infused with our Las Palomas.

Las Palomas coffee from Guatemala has notes of tangerine and chocolate that make a lively, sweet, clean, and fruit-forward cup.

Goodnow Farms uses single-origin cacao beans from Guatemala and their own fresh pressed Asochivite cocoa butter to make a dark chocolate bar that’s intensely flavorful, exceptionally smooth, and true to the single origin Guatemalan flavor.


Las Palomas Coffee

Goodnow Farms Special Reserve Las Palomas Chocolate Bar

products.title: Las Palomas, Guatemala
products.body_html: Las Palomas is an indigenous group of nine contiguous small farms averaging 1.7 acres. They are led by Marcos Domingo. The farms are perched on the steep slopes of the Cuchumatanes mountains, overlooking the Pan-American highway one thousand feet below. These farmers have collectively produced a clean, sweet, fruit-forward, lively cup.

products.body_html: Las Palomas is an indigenous group of nine contiguous small farms averaging 1.7 acres. They are led by Marcos Domingo. The farms are perched on the steep slopes of the Cuchumatanes mountains, overlooking the Pan-American highway one thousand feet below. These farmers have collectively produced a clean, sweet, fruit-forward, lively cup.

products.title: Vero Cappuccino Glass
products.body_html:
notNeutral Vero Cappuccino Glass

Vero is notNeutral's game-changing collection of glassware for specialty coffee. The collection offers a modern take on traditional bar glasses with technical improvements designed to elevate the experience of pouring and sipping coffee beverages. Their exaggerated facets, satisfying weight, and curved interiors (optimized for pouring latte art) have made them a favorite of coffee drinkers around the world.

Offered in two colors: Amethyst and Ocean Blue

Engraved with George Howell Coffee on the side 

Hand-pressed glass

Dishwasher- and microwave-safe

Volume: 6 oz. (177 ml)

Size: 3.5” H x 3.5" W

Made in the USA

products.title: Mamuto AA Medium, Kenya
products.body_html:
George Howell Coffee has been buying Mamuto since 2006. It has never faltered. 
The small 2023 December harvest produced milder flavors than usual. Brewing a medium roast for stronger extraction, such as Espresso or immersion, brings out the sweet blackbery-plum notes for which Mamuto is renowned.

The late Walter Mathagu, founder of Mamuto, always produced coffees that were perfectly ripe and sweet. They ranged from excellent to exquisite even as weather patterns challenged, but never overcame him. He grew the SL-28s variety, easily the equal of any Geisha. Sweeter, fuller-bodied and more complex, Walter‘s beans proved again and again to be the Red Bordeaux Grand Cru of coffee.

Walter was THE small farmer pioneer of quality coffee in Kenya and a consummate craftsman until his passing in 2021. His legacy continues through his family - his son, Patrick Mathagu, now runs this great farm. 

Mamuto grows beneath the slopes of the usually overcast seventeen thousand-plus foot Mt. Kenya, looming above to the north. The soil is deep red-orange in a lush green very gently undulating landscape. All the coffee is processed at the farm right through drying. After drying, the coffee remains in parchment approximately six weeks resting in aerated bins before being transported for final milling and packaging. Besides coffee the Mathagus maintain a herd of dairy cattle and grow bananas, maize, beans and macadamia on their 21-acre farm.

Walter Paul Mathagu was an agricultural officer serving the government of Kenya for seventeen years before retiring in 1987. During that entire time Mrs. Mathagu managed the farm. Taking inspiration from their family, Mr. Mathagu explained that “Mamuto” means “father, mother, and children.” He and his wife named the farm by combining the first two letters from three words: his name, Mathagu, as the father; Muthoni, his wife’s maiden name, as mother; and toto, meaning child or children in Swahili: thus Mamuto. Mr. and Mrs. Mathagu have six children - three boys, three girls. We continue to buy Mamuto’s entire crop.

To experience Mamuto, roasted and brewed properly, is to drink coffee in every way comparable to the finest red wines. More than anyone, Walter has put his coffee region, Kirinyaga, on the map; he has raised small farmer awareness to what is possible and brought seekers of great specialty coffee in growing numbers to his area. Thank you, Walter!

Mamuto AA is a spectacular coffee that has the highest gradation for its uniformly large beans. This results in a fully balanced cup with lively notes that fully demonstrate terroir.

products.title: Kanzu Medium, Rwanda
products.body_html:
Kanzu is a private wet mill buying coffee cherries from approximately 60 farms on the surrounding slopes. The area where the cherries grow has some of the best components for cultivating coffee—high altitudes, a lush ecosystem, and volcanic soil.

Small farmers – many have less than 200 trees – bring their carefully picked cherries to the Kanzu washing station where they are processed. Kanzu is meticulous in the care it takes to remove all the ripe fruit, ferment, and evenly dry the beans, which is showcased through its full-bodied, sweet and elegant cup. 

This is another great quality year for Kanzu; sweet and balanced with dark chocolate and hints of plum and orange.

products.title: Kanzu, Rwanda
products.body_html:
Kanzu is a private wet mill buying coffee cherries from approximately 60 farms on the surrounding slopes. The area where the cherries grow has some of the best components for cultivating coffee—high altitudes, a lush ecosystem, and volcanic soil.

Small farmers – many have less than 200 trees – bring their carefully picked cherries to the Kanzu washing station where they are processed. Kanzu is meticulous in the care it takes to remove all the ripe fruit, ferment, and evenly dry the beans, which is showcased through its full-bodied, sweet and elegant cup. 

This is another great quality year for Kanzu. Pure coffee flavor shaded with black tea-coated notes of sweet plum and orange.

products.title: Momokiemo COE #2, Mexico
products.body_html:
In 2019, Rancho Momokiemo, located in Chiapas, transformed from corn and bean monocultures to coffee agroforestry under the Sembrando Vida (Sowing Life) program.
The program aims to rejuvenate local coffee culture - prioritizing sustainability, eco-friendly practices, and economic recognition. This Cup of Excellence #2 winner has notes of rich, syrupy-honey complimented by wisps of ripe tropical fruit like papaya and mango. We highly recommend this for espresso.

products.title: Med/Dark Roast Gift Subscription
products.body_html:
Gift a 3 or 6 month prepaid subscription to the coffee lover in your life! Surprise and delight your recipient with an exciting single estate or single origin coffee each month. All coffees in this subscription will be medium or dark roast. Shipping each month is included! 

Shipping schedule:

  • Orders placed on or before the 25th of the month will be roasted on the 1st of the following month or the first Monday of the month if the 1st falls on a weekend or holiday. 
  • Orders placed after the 25th will be pushed to next month's shipping date.

products.title: Light Roast Gift Subscription
products.body_html:
Gift a 3 or 6 month prepaid subscription to the coffee lover in your life! Surprise and delight your recipient with an exciting single estate or single origin coffee each month. All coffees in this subscription will be light roast. Shipping each month is included! 

Shipping schedule:

  • Orders placed on or before the 25th of the month will be roasted on the 1st of the following month or the first Monday of the month if the 1st falls on a weekend or holiday. 
  • Orders placed after the 25th will be pushed to next month's shipping date.

products.title: MiiR 12oz 360 Traveler Mug
products.body_html:
MiiR 12oz Traveler Mug

Simplify your travel plans and pack the double-wall vacuum insulated MiiR 360 Traveler. Its Leakproof 360 Lid couldn’t be easier to use: press the center button, sip from any side, then press again to seal. A subtle indicator line clearly shows its open/close position.

Features:

Miir's Thermo 3D® Double wall vacuum-insulation keeps hot drinks hot and cold drinks cold. Ice cube compatible.

Leakproof lid. Sip or pour from any side. Push down on lid to open and again to close. A subtle indicator line clearly shows its open/close position

Safe and durable Hardshell™ Powder Coat finish preserves product appearance, keeping it beautiful no matter where you go. Cup holder compatible

Enduring 18/8 Stainless Steel material meets beautiful design. BPA free.

Care

Wash before first use. Hand wash recommended with a small brush to clean under center button. Lid top rack dishwasher safe. Do not disassemble lid, do not freeze, do not microwave, do not bleach, do not overfill.

CAUTION: When open, liquid can be poured from anywhere around the rim. Use caution with hot liquids and always close lid when not in use. Not for use with carbonated beverages. Choking hazard, may contain small parts not suitable for children under 3 years.

products.title: Dickies Work Shirt
products.body_html:
Dickies Branded Work Shirts

Short Sleeve Work Shirt is a classic style that's existed since 1922. This work shirt is crafted from wrinkle-resistant classic twill fabric, with a generous cut through the shoulders and chest that provides freedom of movement, and square hem design for easy tucking. Our logo is stitched on the chest pocket which also has a pencil slot and non-break buttons. The shirt has a moisture-wicking finish to help keep you cool and dry all day long. Wear it buttoned up or over a simple tee.

Features:
  1. 5.25 oz. 65% Polyester/35% Cotton Twill. Imported

products.title: MiiR 8oz Camp Mug
products.body_html:
Miir 8oz Camp Mug

Featuring our beloved curious cat design, the MiiR Camp Cup takes on beauty, durability and functionality in one fell swoop, making it loveable for all the right reasons (and impossible to own too many). Perfectly paired with the Press-fit Slide Lid. Slide to cover the mouth opening when not in use for an extra dose of insulation and splash-proof peace of mind.

8oz | Compact size for that double shot (and carry-everywhere ease)

Wash before first use. Hand wash recommended. Lid top rack dishwasher safe. Do not freeze, do not microwave, do not bleach, do not overfill.

products.title: Coffee Playing Cards
products.body_html:
Coffee Playing Cards

Level-up your coffee knowledge with this illustrated deck of 52 cards each focused on one key coffee subject. Perfect for the café or at home, for coffee nerds and coffee newbies. The Coffee Deck is filled with beautiful illustrations and fascinating facts, and printed on casino-quality cardstock. It's like a miniature coffee encyclopedia that you can also use to play solitaire, poker, or crazy 8s.

Main Subject Areas in the Deck:

Drink Types: Explore your favorite coffee drinks, from classic cappuccino to trendy cold brew.
Brewing Methods: Learn about the diverse ways to brew a cup of joe, from pour-over to Aeropress.
Key Terminology: Understand coffee jargon like a pro, from "Arabica" to "Cupping."

Science: Delve into the science of coffee, from bean roasting to proper extraction.

About the Maker: Knowhow Studio is a small design shop in Victoria, BC, Canada, run by Ben Barrett-Forrest. The makers at Knowhow Studio love creating beautiful and educational products that bring knowledge and joy into people's lives.

products.title: Origami Dripper
products.body_html:
ORIGAMI MEDIUM DRIPPER

Made with high density minoware clay, the Origami has excellent heat retaining properties. When used with the conical filter, the 20 folds design encourages faster brew time by enabling faster airflow. When used with a wave style filter, it can be used as a flatbed brewer. 

The Origami Dripper carries 400 years of history of minoware production of the Gifu region, famous for its washi paper and pottery. Minoware is a ceramic-making technique some 400-500 years old and only a few dozen artisans left in Japan still know the craft. By purchasing a Origami Dripper, you are bringing this rich tradition into your coffee brewing routine.

Key Features: 
The medium size dripper is suitable for 1-4 cup brew
20-fold design fits with original Origami conical filters, Kalita Wave, or V60 paper filters. However, we recommend using conical filters for better air-flow. Available to purchase on our website. 
Ceramic material made with Mino porcelain, with excellent heat retaining properties.
Conical shape fit with most pour-over holders stands.

products.title: Cerapotta Dripper
products.body_html:
Cerapotta Dripper

Immerse yourself in the world of exquisite coffee with cerapotta's unique coffee filter. Crafted from Japan's porous stone, this minimalist marvel refines water and coffee flavors. Say goodbye to wasteful paper filters and unlock the true essence of your favorite brew.

Hand Crafted in Hasami, Japan
Material: Porous ceramic

How different with the other porous filter?

1. Materials
The main ingredients of cerapotta are: clay + alumina ceramic + proprietary material. Alumina has positive effect on taste and aroma by allowing coffee to be extracted without hindering its original flavor. 

The proprietary material burns out during firing (at 1,200°C), and the burnt-out part creates porosity.

2. Molding Method
Cerapotta is molded using a potter's wheel, with each piece being handcrafted by artisans, resulting in consistent shaping with minimal irregularities. 

3. Maintenance
When coffee brewing becomes slow, place the ceramic pot in boiling water for about 10 minutes to remove any clogs.

More Information - https://cerapotta.us/pages/about-cerapotta
How to Clean the filter - https://cerapotta.us/pages/how-to-clean

products.title: Etkin Dripper & Carafe Set
products.body_html:
Etkin 8 Cup Coffee Dripper

Some things are meant to go together, like our signature 8-cup Dripper and 1.5L carafe.

The Etkin 8-cup Coffee Dripper combines the precision of pour-over coffee with the efficiency and shareability of batch brew. Its proprietary design helps ensure an even extraction for a sweeter, full-bodied cup of coffee.  The carafe is made from temperature-resistant borosilicate glass and can hold up to 1.5 liters of piping hot coffee.

With the Etkin 8-Cup Pour-over Set, there's plenty to go around. 

The Etkin Dripper is made in Turkey from Turkish Porcelain.

products.title: El Injerto La Calaca, Guatemala
products.body_html:
El Injerto has achieved legendary status due to the exceptional terroir, emphasis on processing, and quality of its coffee. It has surpassed any other farm in any country with its numerous Presidential Cup of Excellence Awards. They continue to improve - each year, owners Arturo Aguirre Sr and Jr improve their farm in quality production, social development, and environmental preservation.

La Calaca is a naturally processed champagne-like gesha coffee with sparkling notes of rose, jasmine, and cherry. 

If you wish to receive a grind other than whole bean, please include the request during the checkout process.

products.title: Third Wave Water - Classic
products.body_html:
Third Wave Water - Classic

These packets combine the perfect balance of minerals and alkalinity to water that brings out the best qualities in a coffee yielding a crisp, clean cup that ordinary tap can’t deliver. Add one packet to one gallon of distilled water, shake to dissolve, and brew using your favorite coffee for exceptional results.

products.title: Wood Dripper Holder
products.body_html:
Origami Wood Holder for Dripper

Add this beautiful Acacia wood ORIGAMI Dripper holder to your set up for a touch of zen. This Dripper holder works for both small and medium ORIGAMI Drippers.

Material: Acacia Wood

Diameter: 4.75" / RIm (Underside) 2.5"

products.title: MiiR 8oz GHC Logo Tumbler
products.body_html:
Miir 8oz GHC Logo Tumbler

Perfect for cortados and cappuccinos on-the-go! Our stainless-steel tumbler is simple, easy to travel with, and fits comfortably in both your cupholder and daily routine. Features thermo 3D double-wall vacuum insulation technology and 18/8 medical grade stainless steel. No metal aftertaste and no lingering flavors from previous brews. Hardshell and powder coat. Lid and cup are BPA free. Press-on lid prevents splashes and keeps drinks warm longer. (Please note that the MIIR 8oz Lid is not leak proof.)

products.title: Fellow Pour Over Kettle
products.body_html:
Fellow Stagg Pour Over Kettle

A beautifully functional design kicks your brewing up a notch. Enjoy an intuitive, steady pour with Stagg's precision pour spout. Keep track of temperature with a built in brew range thermometer. Pour at an even, slow pace with Stagg's counterbalanced handle that moves the center of mass back towards your hand.


Materials: 301 18/8 stainless steel body
Capacity: 1.0 L boiling capacity

Compatibility: Electric and gas safe. Not compatible with induction cooktops. Please be aware that placing product on rough or unclean surfaces, as well as normal daily use on cooking ranges, will damage finish on bottom of kettle. This is normal wear and does not affect functionality. Slight discoloration on bottom of copper Stagg will occur when used on gas and electric stoves.

products.title: Fellow Electric Kettle
products.body_html:
Fellow Electric Kettle

Whether you're a coffee aficionado or a brewing beginner, Stagg EKG will be your countertop partner in the pursuit of a ridiculously good cup of coffee.

Variable temperature control, and a stunning, minimalist design, Stagg EKG’s PID Controller steadily maintains the perfect temperature as efficiently as possible. A blazing fast heat time, powered by a 1200 Watt heating element means even less time spent waiting in pursuit of the perfect cup.

When the toggle on the back is switched to HOLD mode, the Stagg EKG will maintain your desired temperature in either Fahrenheit or Celsius for 60 minutes.Back that mass up. Stagg’s weighted handle shifts the center of mass closer to your hand for an easier pour.
